Artifact Exists Maven Plugin
Last Published: 2017-09-28  | Version: 0.0.5
Overview
  • Introduction
  • Goals
  • FAQ
Examples
  • Check existence
  • Using checksums
  • Configuring repository

exists:exists

Full name:

org.honton.chas:exists-maven-plugin:0.0.5:exists

This plugin goal has been deprecated:

Use remote goal

Description:

check for presence of a remote artifact

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • Since version: 0.0.1.
  • Binds by default to the lifecycle phase: initialize.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
artifact String 0.0.1 (no description)
Default value is: ${project.artifactId}-${project.version}.pom.
project String 0.0.1 (no description)
Default value is: ${project.groupId}:${project.artifactId}:${project.version}.
property String 0.0.1 (no description)
Default value is: maven.deploy.skip.
repository String 0.0.1 (no description)
Default value is: ${project.distributionManagement.repository.url}.
skipIfSnapshot boolean 0.0.1 (no description)
Default value is: true.

Parameter Details

artifact:

(no description)
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Since: 0.0.1
  • Required: No
  • Default: ${project.artifactId}-${project.version}.pom

project:

(no description)
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Since: 0.0.1
  • Required: No
  • Default: ${project.groupId}:${project.artifactId}:${project.version}

property:

(no description)
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Since: 0.0.1
  • Required: No
  • Default: maven.deploy.skip

  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Since: 0.0.1
  • Required: No
  • Default: ${project.distributionManagement.repository.url}

(no description)

  • Since: 0.0.1
